column4: ok does any1 know of any repositories not on the ubuntu website??
just whatever i found a few extras but i like to know ALL of my options
i was just wondering if any one knew something i dont!!
i like ubuntu (so far)
im only got divorced from microsoft a week ago
how do i get a complete list of apt-get?
i used apt-get install zsnes and it worked but i cant find it in my synaptic or add/remove repositories
i was wondering if theres a list of the program apt-get has
programs*
i know where on my comp im just wondering why its not in my repositories
like "apt-cache search zsnes"
like what?
there are tons of repositories... especially if you use a distro other than ubuntu...you can get repos located close to your house etc...
you could also check this page: http://psychocats.net/ubuntu/sources
i recommend you just copy one of those sources.list files according to your version of ubuntu and use it
good to hear
what do you mean?
should be in applications -> games
it's not "apt-get" that has the programs, it's your repositories.
apt-get is just a utility to install programs from the command line
if you downloaded it with apt-get then it is in your repositories
